voice.text: Hello, is this your first visit to Venore? I can show you around a little.
Talk to me if you need directions.

parameter.value: Welcome to Venore, |PLAYERNAME|! Would you like some {information} and a {map} guide?
Good bye and enjoy your stay in Venore, |PLAYERNAME|.
Currently, I can tell you all about the {town}, its {temple}, the {bank}, {shops} - well, {warehouses} - {spell} {trainers} and the {depot}.
Would you like me to mark locations like the warehouses, temple and depot on your map?
I will help you find your way in the buzzing city of Venore. I can {mark} important locations on your {map} and give you some {information} about the town.
